content.question: Which of the following best illustrates the protection of an individual’s Fifth Amendment rights?

choices.label: An appeals court rules that a lower court imposed excessive punishment on an individual who broke a law.
A judge blocks an attempt by law enforcement to search a home without probable cause.
After arrest, a suspect is informed of the right to remain silent during interrogation.
During a time of war, soldiers are not quartered in a person’s home without the consent of the owner.

content.answer: After arrest, a suspect is informed of the right to remain silent during interrogation.
